== Current Issues ==

* Tested with 7.10 Gutsy, kernel: 2.6.22-14-generic #1 SMP
* {X} Before the installation of any linux distribution, you should update to BIOS-Version 208 because of kernel panics due to an incompatibility of agp and acpi with the older BIOS, problems comes back on feisty and gutsy, but boots well with the boot option "nolapic"
* needs polish for SD-Card Reader (see notes)
* problems with multimedia-keys (see notes)

== notes ==

=== Card Reader ===

To use sd-cards with the build-in card reader, add the following lines to the file "/etc/modules" <pre>
   tifm_sd
   tifm_7xx1
   tifm_core</pre>

=== Multimedia Keys ===

The issues below are the same as in Asus M6800, tested on dapper and not updated for gutsy

* /!\ Multimedia hotkeys (except volume up/down/mute) are not handled by default <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xkeyboard-config/+bug/37225]]</nowiki>
* Power4gear hotkey not correctly handled: its functionality is '''not to lock the screen''' but to switch between some predefined power profiles (powersave, dynamic, performance...) <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xkeyboard-config/+bug/35791]]</nowiki>
